pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface to 'D4Science' 'StorageHub' API // Provides an interface to 'D4Science' 'StorageHub' API (https://dev.d4science.org/). Allows to get user profile, and perform actions over the 'StorageHub' (workspace) including creation of folders, files management (upload/update/deletion/sharing), and listing of stored resources.
